text: khran meux thukkh phay dı prasb kæ mnusʹy khea k ca wingwxn khx rea tx ma meux rea di prathan khwam pordpran cak rea kæ khea khea k klaw wa thæcring sing thi chan di rab ma nan neuxngcak khwam rxbru khxng chan tanghak tæ (khea ha ru mi wa) man khux kar thdsxb tæwa swn mak khxng phwk khea miru
